sts and to reach investors critical size. In addition, new innovative approaches,

ty has provided a source of volatile investor appetite.
investment by country is often volatile reflecting ending and new regulations and policies

s tougher access to and a substantial cut in FiT

such as with the Clean Development Mechanism (CDM), which stimulated emission reductions and

intervention to ensure fair market access only has proven to burden investor appetite.
